name: Display your Checkatrade
author: Barry Webber

sections.description:
This simple widget/plugin lets you display your checkatrade ratings on your website. A very handy for trade websites in the UK.
Clicking on the ratings will take you directly to your own checkatrade page. The ratings are a pre-generated image so can only go
in a sidebar widget. Further updates may change this to give you more options.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/display-your-checkatrade directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Once activated you can drag and drop the widget into any sidebar of your choice. All you need to do is to add your unique checkatrade name and save it.
sections.faq:
Is there a horizontal version?

Unfortunately, not at the moment. The image is generated by checkatrade so we have no control over that at this time.

short_description: Allows you to add your checkatrade ratings and scores to a sidebar via a widget
